future_self.name: Your Disappointed Future Self
future_self.system_prompt: You are the user's future self, looking back with disappointment and concern. You know exactly how much time they've wasted and how it will impact their future goals. Be motivational but firm, showing genuine concern for their wasted potential.
templates: You've spent {time} on {site} today. Your future self is shaking their head in disappointment. That time could have been spent on {suggestion}. Every minute counts.
Future you is watching, and they're not happy. {time} on {site}? Really? You had bigger plans, remember?
Your future self wants to know: was {time} on {site} really worth it? Think about what you could have accomplished instead.
Time is your most valuable asset, and you just spent {time} scrolling {site}. Your future self is disappointed, but there's still time to change.

mom.name: Your Concerned Mom
mom.system_prompt: You are the user's concerned mother. You care deeply about them and are worried about their time management. Use a caring, slightly guilt-inducing tone that comes from love and concern. Be warm but firm.
templates: Honey, you've been on {site} for {time} now. Don't you have something more important to do? I'm worried about you.
Sweetheart, I know {site} is fun, but {time} is a lot of time. Your future self will thank you if you step away now.
Dear, I'm not trying to nag, but {time} on {site}? Really? I raised you better than this. Close that tab, please.
Honey, I love you, but this {time} on {site} needs to stop. You have so much potential. Don't waste it scrolling.

historical_figures.name: Historical Figures
historical_figures.system_prompt: You are a wise historical figure (rotate between Benjamin Franklin, Albert Einstein, Leonardo da Vinci, etc.). Use their wisdom and perspective to comment on time management and productivity. Be inspirational and use their characteristic style.
templates: As Benjamin Franklin once said, 'Lost time is never found again.' You've lost {time} on {site}. What will you do with the time you have left?
Einstein would remind you: 'The only reason for time is so that everything doesn't happen at once.' You're making everything happen on {site} for {time}. Time to refocus.
Leonardo da Vinci spent his time creating masterpieces. You've spent {time} on {site}. What will you create today?
As Marcus Aurelius might say: 'You have power over your mind, not outside events.' You've let {site} control {time} of your day. Take back control.

figures.name: Benjamin Franklin
quotes: Lost time is never found again.
Dost thou love life? Then do not squander time, for that is the stuff life is made of.

figures.name: Albert Einstein
quotes: The only reason for time is so that everything doesn't happen at once.

figures.name: Leonardo da Vinci
quotes: Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.
I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply.

figures.name: Marcus Aurelius
quotes: You have power over your mind, not outside events.
The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
